reqsimile.gui
Class GUI_EventHandler

java.lang.Object
  reqsimile.gui.GUI_EventHandler
public class GUI_EventHandler
extends java.lang.Object

GUI_Eventhandler handles all events reuslting from interaction with the gui by the user. This includes all buttons, table selections but not menu actions. Menu actions are handled by GUI_MainMenuListener.

This class contains all classes derived from the associated actions or listeners.

Since:
1.4.2
Author:
Johan Natt och Dag

Nested Class Summary
 class GUI_EventHandler.ConnectAction
          ConnectAction represents the Connect button in the requirements sets tabs in the settings dialog.
 class GUI_EventHandler.ConnectLinksAction
          ConnectLinksAction represents the connect button in the links tab in the settings dialog.
 class GUI_EventHandler.FetchFieldsForLinksTableAction
          FetchFieldsForLinksTableAction represents the action when a table is selected in the combo box in the settings dialog's links tab.
 class GUI_EventHandler.FetchFieldsForTableAction
          FetchFieldsForTableAction represents the action when a table is selected in the combo box in the settings dialog.
 class GUI_EventHandler.LinkAction
          LinkAction represents the action for the Link button in the result table.
 class GUI_EventHandler.LinkButtonListener
          LinkButtonListener is used to synchronize the selected row in the result table with the pressed Link/Unlink button.
 class GUI_EventHandler.ResetAction
          ResetAction represents the Reset buttons in the settings dialog.
 class GUI_EventHandler.RsDoubleClickListener
          RsDoubleClickListener represents the action of double clicking a row in a table.
 class GUI_EventHandler.RsSelectionListener
          RsSelectionListener represents the action of selecting a row in a table.
 class GUI_EventHandler.SaveSettingsAction
          SaveSettingsAction takes actions when the Save button in the settings dialog is pressed.
 class GUI_EventHandler.searchTermsOnlyItemListener
          searchTermsOnlyItemListener represents the action of changing the state of the check box used to indicate wheter only the specified search terms shall be used to find similar requirements or if both the selected requirement and the search terms shall be used.
 class GUI_EventHandler.SearchTermSubmitListener
          SearchTermSubmitListener represent the action of pressing Enter in the search term box above the result table.

Constructor Detail

GUI_EventHandler

public GUI_EventHandler(GUI_Main gui)
Constructor. The gui object must be supplied here since this object is created from the gui and the Application object does not have the reference yet (otherwise Application.getGUI() could have worked).

Parameters:
gui - The application main gui
